svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 11 2021
September 11 2021

title: "Week in Ethereum News
September 11, 2021" date: "2021-09-11"
Eth News and Links
Mainnet execution layer
‚Ä¢ Apply for second cohort of core dev apprenticeship program, an effort by Piper Merriam to find and train more core devs
‚Ä¢ Erigon v2021.09.02 : fixes RPC daemon races and bad.block parsing, mdbx update and work on moving tx pool into separate binary
‚Ä¢ Geth considering ending support for archive nodes
EIPs/Standards
‚Ä¢ EIP3855 : PUSH0 instruction
‚Ä¢ EIP3860 : Limit and meter initcode
Proof of stake consensus layer
‚Ä¢ Latest What‚Äôs New in Eth2 üêº
‚Ä¢ PoS implementers call . Notes from Ben Edgington and Alex Stokes : create releases in September for planned Altair upgrade in October
due to investigating lower sync aggregate participation on testnets
‚Ä¢ WARNING: Staking pools are negligently putting users‚Äô money at risk if they run the current majority client (or any future majority
client)
‚Ä¢ Rocket Pool staged launch begins October 6
‚Ä¢ Hardening the BLS12-381 elliptic curve
‚Ä¢ Validator private message sharing proposal for privacy and spam resistance, on chain interaction only for registration
‚Ä¢ Researcher-oriented cadCAD masterclass , learn how to model validator economics
Layer2
‚Ä¢ David Mihal‚Äôs L2 Fees : compare costs to transfer ETH/tokens and swap tokens
‚Ä¢ Vitalik‚Äôs proposal for rollup friendly NFTs : wrapper NFT, cross-rollup transfers and gas-optimized issuing on mainnet
‚Ä¢ zk Rollups and data shards can achieve global scale while remaining technically and economically sustainable
‚Ä¢ Why Arbitrum uses interactive fraud proofs instead of re-executing transactions
‚Ä¢ Arbitrum permissionless token bridging opens October 22, tokens will be bridged as a basic ERC20 unless projects create a custom ERC20
‚Ä¢ Ask centralized exchanges to support rollup on/off ramps
This newsletter is made possible thanks to NEAR !
NEAR CON Alpha is taking place in Lisbon on October 26th & 27th. The event is open to everyone to come and celebrate NEAR's 1 Year
Anniversary since Mainnet launch. Immerse yourself in two days of talks, networking, workshops and a whole lot more provided by the NEAR
Ecosystem and its Community.
Stuff for developers
‚Ä¢ dapptools v0.34.1 : test coverage, install contract libraries using tags/branches such as different OpenZeppelin Contracts versions
‚Ä¢ seth v0.11.0 : EIP1559 support and helpers for ENS
‚Ä¢ dapptools-template : quick start template for dapptools
‚Ä¢ Ricmoo‚Äôs ethers.js update : EIP1559 support and ethers playground
‚Ä¢ web3.js users survey to shape v4 rewrite
‚Ä¢ solidity-shell : interactive Solidity shell with lightweight session recording
‚Ä¢ loogies-svg-nft : on chain SVG NFT example using scaffold-eth
‚Ä¢ Generative-Transfer-Art Solidity for on chain SVGs
‚Ä¢ Mint NFTs using Flashbots
‚Ä¢ NFT gated ephemeral messaging board
‚Ä¢ Beginners: use .env for API credentials and don‚Äôt commit secrets to Git
‚Ä¢ freeCodeCamp beginner Solidity development course (13 video lessons) using Python and Brownie
Security
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin UUPS proxy security advisory , projects should initialize implementation contracts
‚Ä¢ DAO Maker ~$4 million exploit , unprotected init function
‚Ä¢ OpenSea ERC721 transfer to ENS bug introduced and fixed same day, resulted in ownership of first ENS name registered being burnt
‚Ä¢ dYdX SafetyModule upgrade bug , storage layout changed in new implementation contract
‚Ä¢ Tincho‚Äôs (OpenZeppelin) guidelines to integrate price oracles with defensive programming practices
‚Ä¢ Clockwork Finance Framework : automated analysis of economic security of composed DeFi contracts
Ecosystem
‚Ä¢ High gas fees this week reached 7 twei during an NFT launch
‚Ä¢ NFTs should use a mix of distribution methods for initial supply: dutch auction, raffle, fixed price for early community and gifts to
fan creators
‚Ä¢ MEV searcher design of a Synthetix liquidation, open source example of back running a transaction
‚Ä¢ We need to lower the barriers to entry , better tools lead to more devs and more devs lead to better tools and more innovative dapps
‚Ä¢ ENS attestation based DNSSEC claims proposal, reduces gas to ~10%
‚Ä¢ Devcon planned for 2022
Application layer
‚Ä¢ BarnBridge SMART Alpha : epoch based single asset pools, juniors provide downside protection to seniors in exchange for upside leverage
‚Ä¢ SushiSwap‚Äôs BentoBox explainer , application vault where up to 80% of deposited tokens are invested in strategies
‚Ä¢ Cover Protocol and Ruler Protocol shutting down
‚Ä¢ Lessons from Kittyverse, Cheeze Wizards and Loot : ecosystems need to incentivize developers to build on top rather than build their own
‚Ä¢ Alpha Buy Wall , on chain NFT price floor
‚Ä¢ Stewart Brand documentary selling NFTs to stream film with aim to make free to everyone
‚Ä¢ Sorare adds Spain‚Äôs LaLiga NFTs
‚Ä¢ Christie‚Äôs to conduct bidding in ETH
Regulation/business/tokens
‚Ä¢ US SEC intends to pursue legal action against Coinbase for planned Lend product
‚Ä¢ Commissioner Peirce (US SEC): investor protection matters, but so does investor opportunity
‚Ä¢ Former US CFTC chair‚Äôs book CryptoDad: The Fight for the Future of Money available for preorder
‚Ä¢ Standard Chartered issues research report valuing ETH at $26k-35k
‚Ä¢ DAO report : reasons to study DAOs, key takeaways, survey results (~400 participants from ~200 DAOs) and hot takes
General
‚Ä¢ Epic vs Apple : in app purchase alternatives to be allowed, potential for Apple to be less restrictive on Ethereum apps
‚Ä¢ Apple delays plans to scan your iPhone for offending files in iOS15
‚Ä¢ Spook.js transient execution side channel attack targeting Chrome
‚Ä¢ Vulnerabilities in tar and @npmcli/arborist , upgrade node or npm
‚Ä¢ Voyages of cruise ship Satoshi , collapse of crypto seasteading project
‚Ä¢ ProtonMail logged French activists IP address after order by Swiss authorities, Proton provides an onion site for anonymous access
Job Listings
‚Ä¢ Rarible is hiring: VP of Product and Product Manager
‚Ä¢ Enzyme hiring Solidity Eng. & Data Eng. $15k referral for successful hires
‚Ä¢ Winding Tree is hiring a SSI Guru/Smart Contract Dev for ORGiD
‚Ä¢ Solidity is hiring a C++ dev
‚Ä¢ OpenZeppelin is hiring an Open Source Developer
‚Ä¢ Nomic Labs hiring Snr Software Engineers: Hardhat Ignition & Hardhat VSCode
Want to reach people experienced with Ethereum? List your job here. $345 per line (~75 character limit including spaces), payable in ETH
(or 345 DAI or 345 USDC) to abcoathup.eth. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and @abcoathup to get most of the week‚Äôs news in
real time.
Permalink for this week‚Äôs issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-september-11-2021/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note (new/changes in bold ) :
‚Ä¢ Sep 13 ‚Äì deadline to apply for Eth core dev apprenticeship
‚Ä¢ Sep 15-17 ‚Äì MetaCartel MCON Denver
‚Ä¢ Sep 17-Oct 15 ‚Äì ETHOnline hackathon
‚Ä¢ Sep 22¬† ‚Äì Gitcoin Grants Round 11 ends (support Week in Eth News )
‚Ä¢ Sep 30 ‚Äì NFT Fest Australia (virtual)
‚Ä¢ Oct 1-3 ‚Äì EthAtlanta enterprise-focused hackathon & keynotes
‚Ä¢ Oct 20-21 ‚Äì LisCon (Lisbon)
‚Ä¢ Oct 22-24 ‚Äì ETH Lisbon hackathon
